Barrel Format
=============

Type        Block Header        Internal Header     Internal Data   Block Footer
====        ============        ===============     =============   ============
header      <BARREL(>           <header header>     <...data...>    <)>
mesh        <MESH(>             <mesh header>       <...data...>    <)>
material    <MATERIAL(>         <material header>   <...data...>    <)>
